headline: Is Illinois Tool Works Stock Underperforming the Dow?
summary: As Illinois Tool Works has underperformed the Dow over the past year, analysts remain cautious about the stock’s prospects.

headline: 3 Low-Volatility Stocks We Think Twice About
summary: A stock with low volatility can be reassuring, but it doesn’t always mean strong long-term performance. Investors who prioritize stability may miss out on higher-reward opportunities elsewhere.
